caption.title: Relative proportion of cyanobacteria (as a percentage) to turf algae in mat-forming algae measured as benthic cover (A). Flows of production (%) to detritus pool relative to primary productivity (B).
caption.p: Mean Â± SE values per mesocosm are given ( n = 3). Significant main effects ( p < 0.05) are based on two-way ANOVAs (df = 1,8) and are indicated with asterisks. Means with different lowercase letters indicate significant difference among treatments. See S3 Table for statistical test outcomes. C, control; OA, elevated CO 2, OAT, elevated CO 2 and temperature; T, elevated temperature.
